actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide a refundable credit for State and local real and personal property taxes paid by individuals.
short_title: Family Property Tax Relief Act of 2002

summary.text: Family Property Tax Relief Act of 2002 - Permits a phased-in tax credit for an individual in an amount equal to 50 percent of the property taxes paid by the individual. Sets forth a maximum credit amount of $5,000. Prohibits married couples filing separate returns and dependents from benefitting from the credit.

titles.title: Family Property Tax Relief Act of 2002
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide a refundable credit for State and local real and personal property taxes paid by individuals.
